vault"}},"deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool","_wantAmt":"how much Want token to deposit","_weeksCommitted":"how many weeks the user is committing to on this retried"}},"receiveXChainBurnRewardsRequest(uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"The quantity of ZOR tokens to burn","_amountUSDCRevShare":"The amount in USDC that should be minted for revenue sharing with ZOR stakers","_callbackContract":"Address of destination contract in bytes for the callback","_chainId":"The ID of the chain that this request originated from","_failedAmountUSDCBuyback":"The previously failed buyback amount that is being retried","_failedAmountUSDCRevShare":"The previously failed revshare amount that is being retried"}},"receiveXChainRepatriationRequest(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"params":{"_account":"The user on this chain who initiated the withdrawal request","_callbackContract":"The remote contract that called this function.","_chainId":"The Chain ID of the remote chain that initiated this request","_maxMarketMovement":"factor to account for max market movement/slippage. // TODO - need definition","_originalDepositUSDC":"The amount originally deposited into this tranche // TODO net- or gross- of fees? IMPORTANT","_pid":"The pool ID on the remote chain that the user withdrew from","_trancheId":"The ID of the tranche on the remote chain, that was originally used to deposit","_withdrawnUSDC":"The amount of USDC withdrawn on the remote chain"}},"receiveXChainUnlockRequest(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_account":"The address of the wallet (cross chain identity) to unlock funds for","_amountUSDC":"The amount in USDC that should be unlocked and burned"}},"recoverXChainFeeDist(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amountBuybackUSDC":"The amount of buyback in USDC attempted for cross chain operations","_amountRevShareUSDC":"The amount of revshare in USDC attempted for cross chain operations","_blockNumber":"The block number on the remote chain that the earnings distribution was for","_pid":"The pool ID on the remote chain that the earnings distribution was from"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"revertXChainDeposit(address,uint256)":{"details":"Unlocks USDC and returns it to depositor","params":{"_account":"The address of the depositor","_amountUSDC":"The amount originally deposited (TODO: inclusive of fees?)"}},"sendXChainDepositRequest(uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"params":{"_chainId":"The Zorro destination chain ID so that the request can be routed to the appropriate chain","_destinationContract":"The address of the smart contract on the destination chain","_payload":"The input payload for the destination function, encoded in bytes (EVM ABI or equivalent depending on chain)"}},"sendXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"params":{"_chainId":"The Zorro destination chain ID so that the request can be routed to the appropriate chain","_destinationContract":"The address of the smart contract on the destination chain","_payload":"The input payload for the destination function, encoded in bytes (EVM ABI or equivalent depending on chain)"}},"trancheLength(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_pid":"Index of pool","_user":"wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"Number of tranches"}},"transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_fromPid":"index of pool FROM","_fromTrancheId":"index of tranche FROM","_maxMarketMovement":"factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info","_toPid":"index of pool TO"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updatePool(uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool"}},"withdraw(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_harvestOnly":"If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal","_pid":"index of pool","_trancheId":"index of tranche"},"returns":{"_0":"Amount of Want token withdrawn"}},"withdrawAll(uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool"}},"withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,bool,uint256)":{"params":{"_harvestOnly":"If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal","_maxMarketMovement":"factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info","_pid":"index of pool to deposit into","_trancheId":"index of tranche"},"returns":{"_0":"Amount (in USDC) returned"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"buyBackAndRevShare(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,address[],address[],address[])":{"notice":"Performs both buyback and rev share operations for either on-chain or cross-chain"},"deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Deposit Want tokens to associated Vault"},"depositFullService(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)"},"getZorroPerBlock()":{"notice":"Determine the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters"},"inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256)":{"notice":"For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck"},"poolLength()":{"notice":"Number of pools in the Zorro protocol"},"receiveBurnLockedEarningsRequest(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Receives cross chain request for burning any temporarily locked funds for earnings"},"receiveXChainBurnRewardsRequest(uint256)":{"notice":"Receives an authorized burn request from another chain and burns the specified amount of ZOR tokens from the public pool"},"receiveXChainDistributionRequest(uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Receives an authorized request from remote chains to perform earnings fee distribution events, such as: buyback + LP + burn, and revenue share"},"receiveXChainRepatriationRequest(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Receives a repatriation request from another chain and takes care of all fails"},"revertXChainDeposit(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Called by oracle when the deposit logic on the remote chain failed, and the deposit logic on this chain thus needs to be reverted"},"sendXChainDepositRequest(uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Prepares and sends a cross chain deposit request. Takes care of necessary financial ops (transfer/locking USDC)"},"sendXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Prepares and sends a cross chain withdrwal request."},"trancheLength(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool"},"transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault"},"updatePool(uint256)":{"notice":"Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date."},"withdraw(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Fully documentation.text:
@notice Receives a cross chain withdrawal request from the contract layer of the XchainEndpoint contract
 @dev For params, see _withdrawalFullService() function declaration above. Executes idempotently.

params._buybackAmount: The amount of earned token to buyback
params._earnedAddress: The address of the ERC20 earned token to buy back
params._earnedToZORLPPoolToken0Path: The router path for swapping from the Earn token to the primary Zorro LP Pool's 0th token
params._earnedToZORLPPoolToken1Path: The router path for swapping from the Earn token to the primary Zorro LP Pool's 1st token
params._earnedToZORPath: The router path for swapping from the Earn token to the ZOR token on BSC (home chain)
params._revShareAmount: The amount of earned token to share as revenue to the ZOR staking vault

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

returns._0: Number of Zorro tokens per block

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._amountUSDCBuyback: The amount in USDC that was bought back
params._amountUSDCRevShare: The amount in USDC that was rev-shared
params._failedAmountUSDCBuyback: The previously failed buyback amount that was successfully retried
params._failedAmountUSDCRevShare: The previously failed revshare amount that was successfully retried

params._amount: The quantity of ZOR tokens to burn

params._amountUSDCBuyback: The amount in USDC that should be minted for LP + burn
params._amountUSDCRevShare: The amount in USDC that should be minted for revenue sharing with ZOR stakers
params._callbackContract: Address of destination contract in bytes for the callback
params._chainId: The ID of the chain that this request originated from
params._failedAmountUSDCBuyback: The previously failed buyback amount that is being retried
params._failedAmountUSDCRevShare: The previously failed revshare amount that is being retried

params._account: The user on this chain who initiated the withdrawal request
params._callbackContract: The remote contract that called this function.
params._chainId: The Chain ID of the remote chain that initiated this request
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. // TODO - need definition
params._originalDepositUSDC: The amount originally deposited into this tranche // TODO net- or gross- of fees? IMPORTANT
params._pid: The pool ID on the remote chain that the user withdrew from
params._trancheId: The ID of the tranche on the remote chain, that was originally used to deposit
params._withdrawnUSDC: The amount of USDC withdrawn on the remote chain

params._account: The address of the wallet (cross chain identity) to unlock funds for
params._amountUSDC: The amount in USDC that should be unlocked and burned

params._amountBuybackUSDC: The amount of buyback in USDC attempted for cross chain operations
params._amountRevShareUSDC: The amount of revshare in USDC attempted for cross chain operations
params._blockNumber: The block number on the remote chain that the earnings distribution was for
params._pid: The pool ID on the remote chain that the earnings distribution was from

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revertXChainDeposit(address,uint256).details: Unlocks USDC and returns it to depositor

params._amountUSDC: The amount originally deposited (TODO: inclusive of fees?)

params._chainId: The Zorro destination chain ID so that the request can be routed to the appropriate chain
params._destinationContract: The address of the smart contract on the destination chain
params._payload: The input payload for the destination function, encoded in bytes (EVM ABI or equivalent depending on chain)

params._chainId: The Zorro destination chain ID so that the request can be routed to the appropriate chain
params._destinationContract: The address of the smart contract on the destination chain
params._payload: The input payload for the destination function, encoded in bytes (EVM ABI or equivalent depending on chain)

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._harvestOnly: If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into

buyBackAndRevShare(uint256,address,uint2.notice: Performs both buyback and rev share operations for either on-chain or cross-chain

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit Want tokens to associated Vault

depositFullService(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)

getZorroPerBlock().notice: Determine the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).notice: For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck

poolLength().notice: Number of pools in the Zorro protocol

receiveBurnLockedEarningsRequest(uint256.notice: Receives cross chain request for burning any temporarily locked funds for earnings

receiveXChainBurnRewardsRequest(uint256).notice: Receives an authorized burn request from another chain and burns the specified amount of ZOR tokens from the public pool

receiveXChainDistributionRequest(uint256.notice: Receives an authorized request from remote chains to perform earnings fee distribution events, such as: buyback + LP + burn, and revenue share

receiveXChainRepatriationRequest(address.notice: Receives a repatriation request from another chain and takes care of all financial operations (unlock/mint/burn) to pay the user their withdrawn funds from another chain

receiveXChainUnlockRequest(address,uint2.notice: Receives a request from home chain (BSC) to unlock and burn temporarily withheld USDC.

recoverXChainFeeDist(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Recovery function for when home chain `receiveXChainDistributionRequest()` function fails

revertXChainDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Called by oracle when the deposit logic on the remote chain failed, and the deposit logic on this chain thus needs to be reverted

sendXChainDepositRequest(uint256,bytes,b.notice: Prepares and sends a cross chain deposit request. Takes care of necessary financial ops (transfer/locking USDC)

sendXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,byte.notice: Prepares and sends a cross chain withdrwal request.

trancheLength(uint256,address).notice: Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool

transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

withdraw(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Fully withdraw Want tokens from underlying Vault.

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool

withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,bo.notice: Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into USDC
